members.member:
To create the project.
Represent the Folder in which project is to be saved Represent the type of Project i.e. windows application,control library etc. Represent the name of the project Represent the type.i.e.it is of visual studio 8 or visual studio 15 project

To create Windows application project
The path of the project to be saved..eg..E:\Newfolder The name given to the project. It represent comma separated values of path of form file with extension...eg..E:\Testing\WindowsApp\WindowsApp\Form1.vb It represent comma separated values of path of class file with extension...eg..E:\Testing\WindowsApp\WindowsApp\Class1.vb It represent comma separated values of path of dll file with extension...eg..E:\Testing\WindowsApp\WindowsApp\Golbal1.dll It represent the projectId i.e. For project 2008-"VisualStudio.DTE.9.0" and for project 2015-"VisualStudio.DTE.14.0" It represent the path where build dll have to be saved

to add code in vbproj file of windows application
Path of Vbproj file Code of Form and class that has to be added in vbproj file Code of Resx that has to be added in vbproj file Code of dll that has to be added in vbproj file Represent the path where build dll have to be saved

Code That has to be deleted from vbproj
Path of Vbproj file

The form name that has to be set The app path of file

The path of the project to be saved..eg..E:\Newfolder The name given to the project. It represent comma separated values of path of form file with extension...eg..E:\Testing\WindowsApp\WindowsApp\Form1.vb It represent comma separated values of path of class file with extension...eg..E:\Testing\WindowsApp\WindowsApp\Class1.vb It represent comma separated values of path of dll file with extension...eg..E:\Testing\WindowsApp\WindowsApp\Golbal1.dll It represent the projectId i.e. For project 2008-"VisualStudio.DTE.9.0" and for project 2015-"VisualStudio.DTE.14.0" It represent the path where build dll have to be saved

to add code in vbproj file of class library
Path of Vbproj file Code of Form and class that has to be added in vbproj file Code of Reference that has to be added in vbproj file Code of Resx that has to be added in vbproj file Code of dll that has to be added in vbproj file Represent the path where build dll have to be saved
